Package com.smartgwt.client.widgets.calendar

Class Summary
Calendar The Calendar component provides several different ways for a user to view and edit a set of events.
CalendarEvent A type of Record which represents an event to occur at a specific time, displayed within the calendar.
EventWindow Subclass of Window used to display events within a Calendar.
HeaderLevel Defines one level of headers shown above the event area in a Timeline.
Lane Lane shown in a Timeline view.
MonthViewHoverHTMLCustomizer Called to determine the hover HTML to be displayed when the user hovers over a cell displayed in the calendar month view tab.
Timeline Timeline is a trivial subclass of Calendar that configures the Calendar with settings typical for a standalone timeline view: no other tabs (week, month, day) are shown and the control bar is hidden by default.
